text: Pete Livermore (March 22, 1941 â€“ October 20, 2014) was an American politician from the US state of Nevada. He was affiliated with the Republican Party. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. Livermore died of a heart attack on October 20, 2014 in Carson City, Nevada at the age of 73.Nevada Assemblyman dies of heart attack == References == Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Nevada Category:People from Carson City, Nevada Category:Politicians from New Orleans Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
